page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: Education in the area is varied. Braintree College of Further Education is the smallest college in Essex. There is a wide selection of courses for full, part time, day release and evening students. The college runs a club for retired people and has many overseas students from all over the world. Chapel Hill primary school was built in the 1920's and has extensive grounds. Stisted has a small village school. Our school,although not in our area,was built in 1862 and is the oldest school in Braintree. The primary schools all feed into three large comprehensive schools.
